Pre-Game Insights: The St. Louis Cardinals and New York Yankees are set to face off at Yankee Stadium on September 1, 2024.
Miles Mikolas and Nestor Cortes Jr. are the expected starting pitchers for the Cardinals and Yankees, respectively.
The Cardinals have a team batting average of.247 and an ERA of 4.13, while the Yankees have a batting average of.251 and an ERA of 3.75.
